function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex and ambiguous text with potential security risk in encoded parts.","Impact":"Miscommunication, misinterpretation, or misuse of secure data. Potential introduction of security threats.","Mitigation":"Clarify and decode any ambiguous or encoded parts of the text. Use secure channels for communication.","Technologies":"Encryption and decryption tools, secure communication platforms.","People":"Users, communicators, stakeholders, security personnel.","Owner":"Security and IT teams, communicators, stakeholders."}]}
